query_1:
WITH chris_orders AS (
    SELECT 
        customer_id, 
        order_id, 
        order_date_est, 
        channel, 
        budget, 
        goal,
        campaign,
        campaign_id,
        network, 
        business_channel
    FROM mkt_sandbox.TBL_CUSTOMER_ORDER_AGGREGATE 
    WHERE order_date_est BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31'
      AND customer_id = {customer_id}
),
custid_orderid_prodid AS (
    SELECT
        customer_id,
        order_line_id,
        order_id,
        product_id,
        order_line_quantity,
        order_status
    FROM edldb.ecom.order_line_base
    WHERE order_status = 'D' 
      AND customer_id = {customer_id}
),
product_details AS (
    SELECT 
        product_id,
        name,
        category_level3
    FROM edldb.pdm.product 
),
combined AS (
    SELECT 
        cop_id.product_id,
        pd.name,
        SUM(cop_id.order_line_quantity) AS total_quantity
    FROM chris_orders AS c_ord
    LEFT JOIN custid_orderid_prodid AS cop_id
        ON c_ord.customer_id = cop_id.customer_id 
        AND c_ord.order_id = cop_id.order_id
    LEFT JOIN product_details AS pd
        ON cop_id.product_id = pd.product_id
    GROUP BY cop_id.product_id, pd.name
)
SELECT *
FROM combined
ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
LIMIT 10;
query_2:
SELECT
    pp.customer_id,
    pp.pet_name,
    pp.pet_type,
    pp.pet_breed,
    pp.weight,
    pp.gender,
    pp.pet_age,
    pp.medication
FROM edldb.chewybi.pet_profile_aggregate pp
WHERE 
    pp.pp_status   = 'Active' and
    pp.customer_id = {customer_id}
query_3:
select 
    customer_id,
    review_id,
    review_title,
    review_txt
from edldb.cdm.customer_product_rating 
where (submission_tm BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31')
and moderation_status = 'APPROVED' 
and review_txt is not null
and TRY_TO_NUMBER(customer_id) = {customer_id}
query_4:
WITH zip_counts AS (
    SELECT
        customer_id,
        customer_address_zip,
        customer_address_city,
        COUNT(*) AS zip_freq
    FROM edldb.chewybi.customer_addresses
    WHERE customer_id = {customer_id}
    GROUP BY customer_id, customer_address_zip, customer_address_city
),
ranked_zip AS (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
               PARTITION BY customer_id
               ORDER BY zip_freq DESC
           ) AS rn
    FROM zip_counts
)
SELECT customer_id, customer_address_zip, customer_address_city
FROM ranked_zip
WHERE rn = 1
